MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G76 postcode area of Clarkston affecting properties in Randolph Drive and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.59pm on Wednesday 7th April 2021.
